ygData.subject: Re: Gimmee Gimmee!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... How much you paying me for them?  ;-) What s silly is when players come up to me and ask me about my Imbrued and then start offering like 100pp or 200pp
ygData.messageBody:
> Hey, Harmonic! I hear you have some Lambent Bracers? (I didn't say I
> didn't do it with my *primary* character, did I?)

How much you paying me for them? ;-)

What's silly is when players come up to me and ask me about my Imbrued
and then start offering like 100pp or 200pp for a piece. Or how much
for the Six Note Blade? The other thing that really floors me is those
people who insist on me letting them hold something of mine to 'try it
out'. One guy inspected me, and asked me how much for the Cloak of
Shadows I was wearing... jeez, hello, *knock knock* I'm freakin using
it... hello, anybody home?? hehe. ah well. <g>

Harmonic.
